content.description: use higher order function and list to design function (2016 Fall, Midterm 2, Question 8 part d)

p.line: Consider the problem of wanting to determine if the numbers of a list (of at least two items) are all increasing (i.e., every element after the first one is larger than the one before). Note: the input will always have at least 2 items. Here's some of the example calls:
How to fill in the blanks of the following expression so that _CODES_increasing_CODEE_ could work as expected? (described in the order of left to right, up to down)

content.hint: If each element is smaller than the next one, the whole list is increasing.
